page.title: 04OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES.
page.content: VERONICA USED TO GO TO{BROWNIES, SOMETIMES THEY PLAYED GAMES, SOMETIMES THEY MADE THINGS LIKE SCRAPBOOKS AND THEY DID QUITE A LOT OF BADGES. WHEN SHE LEFT BROWNIES SHE HAD AN ARMFUL OF BADGES. 12 PEOPLE IN OUR SCHOOL WENT TO BROWNIES. EMMA HAS BEEN TO A {YOUTH CLUB.}IT IS MOSTLY FOR TEENAGERS. IT HAS PLENTY OF THINGS FOR YOU TO DO LIKE DARTS, TABLE TENNIS AND MANY MORE. THEY ALSO GET QUITE A FEW PEOPLE GOING. 13 CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL GO TO YOUTH CLUB. ZOE GOES TO {BALLET.}SHE LEARNS HOW TO DO STEPS,SHE THINKS THE POLKA IS THE EASIEST PART. AT BALLET YOU WEAR BLACK LEOTARDS AND PINK BALLET SHOES WITH A HEAD BAND AND WHITE SOCKS.14 PEOPLE IN OUR SCHOOL GO TO BALLET. REBECCA WENT TO{RUGBY}ONCE. 12 OTHER PEOPLE AT OUR SCHOOL PLAY RUGBY.
